loaded = list()
for name in filenames:
data = load_file(prefix + name)
loaded.append(data)
# stack group so that features are the 3rd dimension
loaded = dstack(loaded)
return loaded
Listing 22.4: Example of a function for loading a group of ﬁles.
We can demonstrate this function by loading all of the total acceleration ﬁles. The complete
example is listed below.
# load group of files from the har dataset
